name: Vile Hive
flavorText: "Who sees an oozing, vermin-filled nest hanging from a branch and says, 'That is exactly what I was hoping to carry around all day'?" —Lyndon the Scoundrel
flavorTextHtml: "Who sees an oozing, vermin-filled nest hanging from a branch and says, 'That is exactly what I was hoping to carry around all day'?" —Lyndon the Scoundrel

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Locust Swarm gains the effect of the Pestilence rune and deals 47% increased damage. (Witch Doctor Only) [45 - 60]%
